|802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.4.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Wavespot, Wavespot-Free-Internet |defaultssid_regex = ^Wavespot$,,,^Wavespot-Free-Internet$ |default_ch = |manuf = Tensun tek Electronic |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/01/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 609728995768 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004I57CJK |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Manufactured by Tensun tek Electronic, same hardware appears to be used for the ProntoPoint-AP (FCC ID: TVVPPAP-USB ?) The device is pictured with a label showing a MAC address of 00:25:22:2F:?0:00 in the FCC internal photos. This is corroborated with WiGLE data for the default SSIDs. "QK-IP2202 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board. The power adapter included with the device is a HB12-09010SPA (9V, 1A). ===Defaults=== The manual mentions the default AP passkey as being the last 6 digits of the MAC address printed on the label (w/ upper case letters). The manual also mentions that 'Wavespot' has IP addresses in the 192.168.4.x range and '''Wavespot-Free-Internet''' has addresses in the 192.168.3.x range. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.wavespot.net/ Product homepage]
[http://wavespot.net/manual.html?v=start_guide Quick start guide] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
         J2 [VCC] (Tx) (Rx) (GND)
